# How to Install and License Element 3D V2 for After Effects
 
Element 3D V2 is a powerful plug-in that allows you to import and animate 3D objects in After Effects. It also comes with a library of models, materials, and presets to enhance your 3D projects. In this article, we will show you how to install and license Element 3D V2 for After Effects.
 
## Element 3d V2 Crack License 12


[**Download**](https://www.google.com/url?q=https%3A%2F%2Furluso.com%2F2tKATr&sa=D&sntz=1&usg=AOvVaw2Y-876csIQxIPXsA8PfRrO)

 
## Step 1: Download and Install Element 3D V2
 
To download Element 3D V2, you need to purchase it from the Video Copilot website. Once you have completed the payment, you will receive an email with a download link and a license key. You can also access your download and license from your Video Copilot account.
 
To install Element 3D V2, unzip the file and double click to start the installation process. You will be asked to choose which versions of After Effects you want to install the plug-in to. You can also choose a custom location for the plug-in if you prefer. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation.
 
## Step 2: License Element 3D V2
 
To license Element 3D V2, you need to open After Effects and create a new composition with a new solid. Then, apply the Element effect to the solid from the Effect tab. This will open the Scene Interface of Element 3D V2.
 
There are two ways to license Element 3D V2: automatic and manual. The automatic method is easier and faster, but it requires an internet connection. The manual method is more complicated, but it can be useful if you have internet issues or other problems.
 
### Automatic License Installation
 
To use the automatic method, follow these steps:
 
1. Click on the Scene Interface, a Generate License window will pop-up.
2. Enter your Video Copilot Store login information and click Generate License.
3. The plug-in will verify your license online and activate it.
4. You can now use Element 3D V2 in After Effects.

### Manual License Installation
 
To use the manual method, follow these steps:

1. Click on the Scene Interface, a Generate License window will pop-up.
2. Click on Request File, this will generate a License Request file.
3. Save your file to a location on your computer.
4. Go to your Video Copilot Store account download section and click on the Element download page.
5. Near the bottom right of the page, click browse under the Manual License Generator section to select the License Request File you saved.
6. Click Generate License and it will prompt you to save the License File.
7. Go back to After Effects and in the Element License window under step 3 click Install License File.
8. Select the License File you downloaded from the store.
9. The plug-in will verify your license offline and activate it.
10. You can now use Element 3D V2 in After Effects.

## Troubleshooting
 
If you encounter any problems with installing or licensing Element 3D V2, you can visit the troubleshooting section of the Video Copilot website for more help. You can also contact support@videocopilot.net for assistance.
 
We hope this article helped you install and license Element 3D V2 for After Effects. If you want to learn more about how to use this plug-in, you can check out some tutorials on the Video Copilot website or YouTube channel[^1^] [^2^]. Happy creating!
